Alerts._comment: Patient-specific alerts: Patient ID -> Message shown when processing their reports
Alerts.215715-4: Jesse Lucatero - for any reports processed on this case, please send a copy to Judicial Assistant Troy Podratz (TPodratz@lacourt.org) CM
Alerts.219124-5: Daryl Shreve is on the CARE court list 02/26
Alerts.219596-4: Kelley is on the CARE court list 02/20

Weekly._comment: Location of the currently active weekly Excel tracker

cdo_filepath._comment: Paths for CDO report tracking files and visit logs

county_alerts._comment: Displays special alert messages per county during processing or printing
county_alerts.BUTTE: Please check forensic info for changes to the court number and judge name
county_alerts.KERN: Check with court clerk before faxing. They often require a phone confirmation.
county_alerts.LOS ANGELES: Use internal e-filing only. Include form CR-206 if available.
county_alerts.MADERA: No fax. Must mail originals to the court.
county_alerts.ORANGE: Fax AND mail required to meet deadline. Include cover letter and DA copy.
county_alerts.RIVERSIDE: Send to court using e-Submit. (see OneNote)
county_alerts.SACRAMENTO: Use the new fax number ending in -8579. See OneNote if uncertain.
county_alerts.SAN DIEGO: Fax is not used. Use e-filing platform and include court form MC-025.
county_alerts.SAN JOAQUIN: Don't send reports to San Joaquin with a cover page. Email them to the clerk via the shared address. See OneNote.
county_alerts.TULARE: DO NOT fax. All reports must be mailed or e-filed using Tyler.
county_alerts.YUBA: Send by mail only. Court requires original signature pages.

edo_filepath._comment: Paths used by the EDO (Forensic Office) for templates, logs, and audit files

email_list._comment: Shared email lists used in automation (e.g. for sending notifications or documents)

listbox._comment: Values used to populate list boxes and combo boxes in forms
cover_pages: A. Convert This Document to PDF
F. [Deprecated] Periodic Progress Report 1026(f) Cover Letter
G. WIC 6316.2 MDSO Ext Cover and Affidavit

report_approvals._comment: First field is folder location for templates w/signatures, second is the signature file

log_files._comment: Paths to Excel logs for different legal categories

log_files_status_bar._comment: Short summary of what each log type covers

this_config._comment: Identifies this config file type or scope
this_config.name: global config

version._comment: Version and maintenance info for the config
version.instructions: fixed error handling when patient number doesn't match database
